document_data.name: ''Wand of the War Mage''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of the war mage''''' was a [[magic item|magical]] [[wand]] that increased the accuracy of its wielder's [[spell]]s.
document_data.Powers:
Certain attack spells cast by the wielder of a ''wand of the war mage'' had an increased probability to hit their intended targets. The wand did not otherwise change the spells in any other way.

Several types of ''wands of the war mage'' existed, which offered different levels of accuracy improvement.
document_data.Notable Owners: An unknown [[gnome]] spellcaster died in the [[Bone Brambles]] in [[Avernus]] in possession of a ''wand of the war mage'' and a ''[[hat of disguise]]''.
